El 15 de junio de 1215 y, tras una d...","plot":"Inglaterra, principios del siglo XIII. El 15 de junio de 1215 y, tras una dura negociaci\u00f3n, el desp\u00f3tico rey Juan se vio obligado a aceptar ciertas peticiones de los se\u00f1ores feudales, cuyo objetivo era limitar el poder real. As\u00ed naci\u00f3 la Carta Magna. Sin embargo, tras reunir un fuerte ej\u00e9rcito, Juan se neg\u00f3 a cumplir el acuerdo, provocando as\u00ed una guerra civil: la Primera guerra de los Barones (1215-1217). El rey decidi\u00f3 eliminar a los que lo hab\u00edan humillado, especialmente a un grupo de caballeros templarios que, atrincherados en el castillo de Rochester, intentaron resistir el asedio de las tropas reales.","cast":[{"name":"James Purefoy","role":"Thomas Marshal","images":{"face":"\/e2\/01\/e201cbe51474af7b7ccce5d7b43238d9.jpg"},"id":8662},{"name":"Brian Cox","role":"Baron William d'Aubigny","images":{"face":"\/74\/0c\/740c86920f1285c0691e8c81f1d4a4a0.jpg"},"id":2999},{"name":"Kate Mara","role":"Lady Isabel","images":{"face":"\/70\/56\/70567218dfc819f23eb430463fb05c97.jpg"},"id":32886},{"name":"Derek Jacobi","role":"Baron Reginald de Cornhill","images":{"face":"\/2d\/df\/2ddf82d3a7e494df04c6c67ff1262ae1.jpg"},"id":158},{"name":"Paul Giamatti","role":"King John","images":{"face":"\/1a\/c9\/1ac9bf7ebb2210c1b86af596a19df450.jpg"},"id":89},{"name":"Charles Dance","role":"Archbishop Langton","images":{"face":"\/ad\/10\/ad10ba73b70eda7b50bfee0f7e2cc6ab.jpg"},"id":7115},{"name":"Jason Flemyng","role":"Gil Becket","images":{"face":"\/67\/e3\/67e3d18a9ee82b215b354e3956a4cd7f.jpg"},"id":6328},{"name":"Jamie Foreman","role":"Jedediah Coteral","images":null,"id":66710},{"name":"Mackenzie Crook","role":"Daniel Marks","images":{"face":"\/c4\/db\/c4dbe74c5c0ec4c5ea0a3d30405c666a.jpg"},"id":4924},{"name":"Rhys Parry Jones","role":"Joseph Wulfstan","images":null}],"genres":["Action","Adventure","History","Romance"],"distributor":null,"numInteractions":112348,"numRatings":19441,"ratingHistogram":{"1":469,"2":1142,"3":5749,"4":7999,"5":4082},"seasonsBlocked":[],"producers":[{"name":"Mythic International Entertainment","images":null,"id":111669},{"name":"ContentFilm International","images":null},{"name":"Film & Entertainment VIP Medienfonds 4 GmbH & Co.
